description: Amazing Stories, volume 9, number 2 (June 1934). Scanned copy of a pulp magazine published by Teck Publications, Inc. and edited by Thomas O'Conor Sloane, Ph.D. Periodical copyright not renewed. Individual contributions' copyrights not renewed. This magazine and its contents are now in the public domain. Featuring: The Lost City (Milton R. Peril; 2/3), Peace Weapons (Abner J. Gelula), Hastings√¢1066 (L. B. Rosborough), Love of Country (T. O'Conor Sloane), Subjugating the Earth (Walter Kateley), The Choice (Ralph Maughan), and Measuring a Meridian (Jules Verne; 2/4).
